title: Taskdn Project
description: Schema for Taskdn project file frontmatter. A Project represents a collection of related tasks with a defined end goal.

unique-id.description: A unique identifier for the project.

status.description: The workflow status of the project. Values are case-sensitive and must be lowercase. If absent, the project has no defined workflow state.

description.description: A short description of the project. Should be under 500 characters.

start-date.description: When work on the project began or will begin.

end-date.description: When the project was completed or is expected to complete.

blocked-by.description: Projects that must be completed before this one can start.

taskdn-type.description: Explicit type marker for mixed-content directories. If any project file has this field, files without it will be ignored.

fileReference.description: A reference to another file: WikiLink ([[Page Name]]), relative path (./path/file.md), or filename (file.md).
